benchmark_details.name: XtraQA
benchmark_details.overview: XtraQA is a comprehensive dataset consisting of 7,040 research papers from top-tier venues, annotated with over 140,000 instruction-response pairs that facilitate context-aware and controllable revisions in academic writing.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset that enhances the capabilities of LLMs in academic paper revision through human-AI collaboration.

data.source: 7,040 research papers collected from ICLR 2024 and annotated for instruction-response pairs.
data.annotation: Annotated with over 140,000 instruction-response pairs reflective of realistic scientific revisions.

methodology.calculation: Maximizing the conditional log-likelihood of generated revisions given original paragraphs and instructions.
methodology.interpretation: Positive win rates indicate improved quality of paper revisions.
methodology.baseline_results: XtraGPT outperformed baseline models including GPT-4o-mini.
methodology.validation: Validation through quantitative and qualitative evaluations with human judges.

harm: Potential for over-reliance and introduction of bias from training data.
